article_title: For working poor in North Carolina, income drop creates health care fear
article_text: At 61, Ken Helms of Charlotte would love to have health insurance. Based on what he earned directing traffic this year, he’s eligible for federal help paying premiums and out-of-pocket costs under the Affordable Care Act.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Medicaid gap, Affordable Care Act, Obamacare, health insurance, North Carolina, working poor
